replies.body: holy fuck i have not seen the name fortunexhunter in ages. goddamn he was vnutz tier autist.
no way man, vnutz is his own tier.

It's not Riot's fault, it's the premade's for not deciding who goes where. When you are running a large premade it is up to those people to decide where people go. The system will just list everyone as their Primary, because if they queued up like that maybe they *want* duo mid.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=FduBhEpH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-22T09:10:22.255+0000)
>
> It's not Riot's fault, it's the premade's for not deciding who goes where. When you are running a large premade it is up to those people to decide where people go. The system will just list everyone as their Primary, because if they queued up like that maybe they *want* duo mid.

I know you're deeply in love with Riot but you don't need to defend them over something that is clearly not even negative. The point of the post is to highlight something that is not supposed to happen and as such is funny.
